name: Rabies
description: Prevents rabies, a deadly and zoonotic disease.

name: Trivalent
first_dose_description: Between the eighth and ninth week of life.
boosters_description: Three or four weeks after the first dose. Then, annually.

name: Feline Leukemia
description: Protects against feline leukemia virus, causing immunosuppression.
first_dose_description: Recommended in the first months of life.
boosters_description: As advised by the veterinarian, generally annually.

name: Feline Immunodeficiency Virus (FIV)
first_dose_description: Based on the risk of exposure.

name: Chlamydia felis
description: Protects against Chlamydia felis infection, causing respiratory issues.
first_dose_description: Based on the risk of exposure.
